sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: President Volodymyr Zelensky has confirmed that counter-offensive actions are underway against Russian forces.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He made the comments during a press conference with visiting Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau. At least three people have been killed and more than two dozen wounded in a drone attack on the Black Sea port of Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A block of flats took the brunt of the blast.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile the last operating reactor at the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant has been put into cold shutdown, both as a precautionary measure and because nearby shelling had damaged the lines connecting it to Ukraine's energy system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Former US President Donald Trump made his first appearance since his federal indictment on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Speaking to Republican audiences in Georgia and North Carolina, Trump looked to rally supporters to his defense by dismissing the charges brought by the U.S. Justice Department.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The ridiculous and baseless indictment of me by the Biden administration's weaponized Department of Injustice will go down as among the most horrific abuses of power in the history of our country. Many people have said that. Democrats have even said it. This vicious persecution is a travesty of justice. It comes as federal prosecutors unsealed a wide-ranging indictment of Donald Trump on Friday. They accused the former president of endangering national security by keeping top-secret nuclear and defense documents after leaving the White House. Trump denies any wrongdoing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Ted Kaczynski, the Harvard-educated killer who was known as the Unabomber, has died in prison aged 81. Kaczynski ran a bombing campaign between 1978 and 1995 that killed three people and injured 23 others. The hunt for the unknown perpetrator traumatized the United States, with the FBI giving him the name the Unabomber because he targeted universities and airlines.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: People across Europe and beyond took part in annual pride parades over the weekend in a celebration of LGBTQ rights, achievements and communities. In Rome, campaigners took to

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: the streets and called out what they see as attacks on the community under Prime Minister Giorgio Maloney's government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In Tallinn, paraders took to the streets once again after a six-year break under the motto, one for all and all for equality.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Earlier this month, Prime Minister Kadja Kalas tabled a bill to legislate marriage for gay couples.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And across the sea in Washington, US President Joe Biden hosted the largest Pride event to be held at the White House. He used the occasion to condemn the recent wave of quote callous and cynical state laws restricting LGBTQ rights. And all to all of you happy Pride Month, happy Pride year, happy Pride Month. Happy Pride Year. Happy Pride Life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Manchester City's pursuit of Champions League glory reached its pinnacle

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: as Pep Guardiola's team edged out into Milan 1-0 in an intense showdown in Istanbul on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Up against a well-drilled Inter side, Erling Haaland's teammates were made to dig deep before Rodri eventually scored the winner in the 68th minute, capping off an exceptional season and prompting wild celebrations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: For Guardiola, this victory solidifies his status as one of the managerial greats, adding a third Champions League triumph to his previous two achieved at Barcelona.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It was a tough game, they made it hard, but I think if you look at the chances created, I think we were sort of there and we were on it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Just they were a tough side and we had to break them down slowly and in the end it paid off.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Fantastic, I've waited 60 years to see that.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Brilliant, fantastic, best night ever.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Manchester City have now joined an elite group of only eight European clubs to have achieved a continental treble, joining the likes of Manchester United, Bayern Munich, PSV, Barcelona, Ajax, Celtic and Inter.
